topMoments.title: Calgary Trip
topMoments.description: This trip was one of the most spontaenous and fun things I've ever done with you. I loved being able to go bar hopping with you (and Ritika). Those shafts were the best and worst thing ever. Hanging out the next day with Juanita, Diego and Xavi at the beach at the expense of missing our bus was 10000% the right decision and 10000% fun. I look forward to doing more spontaneous things with you in the future!

topMoments.title: Water Lantern Festival
topMoments.description: The water latern festival was something I had been planning since we first got together, when you told me your favorite Princess movie is Tangled. I'm so happy we got to experience this together, and to make our little pieces of memories, to set out to the sea. I look forward to doing more special things like this with you!

topMoments.title: Hot Pot Date Nights
topMoments.description: Going to hot pot has become one of my favorite things and special things to do with you. There's nothing like the taste of trying out the sauces you make (no matter how spicy I think they are), and trying out new foods that I would never check out on my own. You introduce to me new things each and everyday and I feel so grateful and excited at the thoughts of trying out new things with you for a long time to come!

photos.caption: ANU PUT THAT PHONE DOWN RIGHT NOW üò†

funFacts: Our peak Netflix time is Sundays at 2 AM - Revenge Procratination FTW
We ordered Uber Eats 47 times - Gotta pump these numbers up for 2026!
Tasty House is officially our spot - those chinese ladies love us!
Longest binge session: 13 episodes of Breaking Bad on Feb 16, 2025 - 9.6 hours!
We watched 66 different shows together - So thankful for the new media you showed me!
5 hot pot dates since July because nothing says love like unlimited food
31 weekend date outings - Date nights with you are my favorite!
outroMessage: This year was full of new experiences, new challenges, and new memories. I'm so glad and so grateful to have been able to go through all of these with you. I love you and I can't wait to see what the future holds for us! üíõ
